full_summary:
**Software Architect (Cloud and IOS Mobile) Contract - Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA)**

**Tender Invitation:**

The Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) is seeking a contract for a Software Architect with expertise in Cloud and IOS Mobile technologies. The IT Solutions and Operations (ITSO) of the CBSA requires a professional resource with the ability to provide expert-level advice and contribute complex work products in specific technologies, processes, applications, and integrated programs.

**Key Requirements:**

* Advanced expertise in Cloud, IOS Mobile, and related technologies
* Strong technology leadership skills to provide expert-level advice and contributor complex work products
* Experience in supporting and assisting with Government of Canada business application systems and security system projects
* Ability to provide interdepartmental and stakeholder support for IM/IT initiatives

**Procurement Details:**

* **Solicitation Number:** 1000454882
* **Publication Date:** August 3, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** August 25, 2023, at 14:00 EST
* **Contracting Entity Name:** Canada Border Services Agency
* **Regions of Opportunity:** National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)

**Notice Details:**

* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Selection Criteria:** Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

**Disclaimer:**

Please note that all tender documents and detailed information can be found in the attached documents. Potential vendors should review these documents carefully before submitting their proposal.

**Contact Information:**

If you have any questions or concerns, please contact:

Mr. Yves Cloutier
yves.cloutier@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca
(343) 551-6781

**Links to Tender Documents:**

* English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7854/1000454882---npp-en-amd-001.pdf, https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7854/1000454882---npp-en.pdf
* French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7854/1000454882---npp-fr.pdf, https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7854/100
